mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_import
order by ${orderByClause}
select max(import_serial_number) from tb_import where import_serial_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{importSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_import (import_id, import_serial_number, import_datetime, import_batch_number, import_total_price, payment_status, payment_type, payment_time, import_type, import_status, import_remark, provider_id, provider_name, provider_code) values (#{importId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{importSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importTotalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
